name: The Tech Blog
summary: A CMS-style blog site for developers to publish articles, blog posts, thoughts, and opinions for others to read and comment on.

name: Critics Corner
summary: An application for users to rate movies and comment on other user movie ratings.

name: Gotta Go
tech: CSS, JS, API, Node, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL, ApolloServer
summary: A full-stack application that allows users to search for public restrooms based on their preferences.

name: Budget Tracker
summary: A budget tracker PWA for users to track their withdrawals and deposits with or without an internet connection in order to maintain an accurate account balance while traveling.

name: Note Taker
summary: A note taking app using an Express.js back end to store and display previous notes as well as save new notes.

name: Recipe Wizard
summary: A site where the user can receive suggested recipes based on a certain number of criteria: amount of calories, time of day, type of meal, and also diet restrictions. In addition, we are able to suggest cookbooks for those who need additional recipes.
